> [antiphase](#comment_25_1NoRNknY1JbJ8nMdn88LwczyMDFnR1GtNw): Your ID is stored in data/users.json and the sites you are seeding are in data/sites.json. The *.pem files are newly generated every time you start ZeroNet.
